intro.title: Why It's Time for a Redesign and Migration of Your Site?
intro.content: In the rapidly evolving digital world, a website created a few years ago may no longer meet modern standards. WordPress, Wix, Joomla and similar platforms were an excellent choice in the past, but today there are more advanced technologies that offer incomparably better performance, security and user experience.

benefits.title: Key Benefits of Migrating to Next.js

items.title: Unmatched Performance
items.description: Next.js uses the most modern technologies such as Server-Side Rendering (SSR), Static Site Generation (SSG) and Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR). This means your site loads at lightning speed, directly impacting user satisfaction and conversion rates. Studies show that 40% of users abandon a site if it doesn't load within 3 seconds - with Next.js, your site will load in under a second.

items.title: Superior SEO and Visibility
items.description: Google ranks fast sites higher in search results. Next.js enables server-side rendering, meaning search engines can immediately index your content, unlike traditional Single Page Applications. Automatic optimization of images, meta tags and structured data ensures your site gets maximum visibility. Clients who migrated to Next.js see an average 30-50% increase in organic traffic.

items.title: Perfect Mobile Experience
items.description: Over 60% of internet traffic comes from mobile devices. Next.js provides perfect responsive design that automatically adapts to all screen sizes. Progressive Web App (PWA) functionality allows your site to work even offline, send push notifications and provide an experience that surpasses native apps. Google Core Web Vitals Score of 90+ guaranteed.

items.title: Significant Cost Savings
items.description: Eliminate monthly costs of expensive WordPress plugins, themes and add-ons. Clients save an average of €300-1000 per year after migration.

items.title: Maximum Security
items.description: WordPress sites are frequent targets for hackers due to their popularity and numerous plugin vulnerabilities. Next.js applications are significantly more secure as they don't use databases in the traditional way and have no admin panel that can be hacked. No need for constant plugin updates and security patch worries. Built-in protection from XSS, CSRF and SQL injection attacks. Automatic HTTPS and best security practices out of the box.

items.title: Better Conversion and Engagement
items.description: Faster site means more satisfied users and more conversions. Every 100ms reduction in load time results in a 1% increase in conversion. Modern animations and interactions create an unforgettable user experience. Real-time functionality, content personalization and fast navigation between pages keep users engaged. Analytics show that Next.js sites have 25-40% lower bounce rates than traditional platforms.

whyNextJS.title: Why Next.js?
whyNextJS.subtitle: Next.js is an advanced React framework used by global giants like Netflix, Nike, Twitch, TikTok, Uber and Hulu

features.title: Modern Technology
features.description1: Next.js is built on React, the world's most popular JavaScript library. It uses the latest web standards and industry best practices. Unlike WordPress, which is built on 30-year-old PHP technology, Next.js represents the future of web development.
features.description2: Automatic code splitting optimization means users only download the code they need for the current page, drastically reducing load time. Image optimization automatically compresses and serves images in modern formats like WebP.

features.title: Flexibility and Scalability
features.description1: Next.js gives you complete control over every aspect of your site. It's not limited by themes and plugins like WordPress. You can implement any functionality you can think of, from simple landing pages to complex web applications.
features.description2: As your business grows, the site easily scales. Whether you have 100 or 10 million monthly visitors, your Next.js site will run flawlessly. Automatic scaling on platforms like Vercel ensures you never lose visitors due to server crashes.

features.title: Incredible Performance
features.description1: Next.js uses a hybrid approach combining Static Site Generation (SSG) and Server-Side Rendering (SSR). Static pages are generated during the build process and served at lightning speed from CDNs worldwide.
features.description2: Prefetching technology automatically loads links visible on screen, making navigation between pages instant. Lazy loading ensures resources load only when needed. The result? Google PageSpeed Score of 95-100.

features.title: Global Availability
features.description1: Your site will be available to users worldwide at incredible speed thanks to Edge Network technology. Content is automatically distributed to hundreds of servers around the planet and served from the closest server to each visitor.
features.description2: Internationalization (i18n) is built into Next.js, meaning you can easily create multilingual sites. Automatic language detection, SEO-friendly URLs for each language and optimization for local markets.

items.question: How long does the migration process take?
items.answer: It depends on the size and complexity of the site. A small site (5-10 pages) can be migrated in 2-3 weeks. A medium site (20-50 pages) usually takes 4-6 weeks. A large site or e-commerce platform can take 8-12 weeks. We provide you with an exact timeline after the initial analysis.

items.question: Will my site be unavailable during migration?
items.answer: No! Your current site remains fully functional throughout the entire process. We develop the new site on a staging server and test it completely before launch. The transition from old to new site happens instantly, usually taking only a few minutes for DNS propagation.

items.question: What happens to my SEO ranking?
items.answer: SEO is our priority! We implement 301 redirects for all old URLs, retain all meta tags, structured data and optimize technical SEO. In most cases, clients see improved SEO rankings after migration due to better performance and Core Web Vitals. We offer 90-day SEO monitoring after launch.

items.question: Can I keep my current design?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can choose between three options: (1) Identical transfer - we keep the current design pixel-perfect, (2) Refresh - we keep the structure but modernize elements, or (3) Complete redesign - we create a new modern design. Most clients choose option 2 for the best balance.

items.question: How much does migration cost?
items.answer: The price depends on the scope of work. Small sites start from €1,500, medium sites €3,000-€6,000, and large complex projects or e-commerce can be €8,000+. We offer a free estimate after analyzing your site. Payment is divided into several phases (deposit, milestones, final payment).

items.question: Can I update the site after migration?
items.answer: Yes! We can integrate a headless CMS like Sanity, Contentful or Strapi that allows you to easily update content like in WordPress. Alternatively, we offer maintenance packages where we do updates for you. We also provide video tutorials and documentation.

items.question: What happens to images and video files?
items.answer: All media is migrated and automatically optimized. The Next.js Image component automatically compresses images, generates responsive versions and serves them in modern formats (WebP, AVIF). Video files can be hosted on your server or migrated to cloud storage (Cloudinary, AWS S3) for better performance.

items.question: Do I retain control over the domain?
items.answer: Completely! You retain ownership of the domain. We only update DNS records to point to the new server. You can use any domain registrar (GoDaddy, Namecheap, CloudFlare, etc.). We'll help you with DNS configuration and SSL certificate.

items.question: What if I find a bug after launch?
items.answer: We offer 30 days of free post-launch support. All bugs and issues that occur during this period will be fixed at no additional cost. After that, you can choose between hourly support or a monthly maintenance package.

items.question: Can I keep my blog and existing posts?
items.answer: Of course! All blog posts, categories, tags and comments will be migrated. We can integrate a CMS for easy future blog posts, or implement a Markdown-based blog system. URL structure can remain the same for SEO (/blog/post-name) or be optimized.

items.question: Will my forms and integrations work?
items.answer: Yes! We migrate all contact forms, newsletter subscription forms, payment integrations, CRM connections (HubSpot, Salesforce), email marketing (Mailchimp), analytics (Google Analytics, Meta Pixel) and all other third-party services you use.
